Class Dispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dispatcher

  • public class Dispatcher
extends java.lang.Object

      private java.util.List<Agent> agents 
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dispatcher()
      Initialize the thread pool (with a size of 10) and create a list of agents.

    • Field Detail

      • executor

        private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor

      • agents

        private java.util.List<Agent> agents

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dispatcher

        public Dispatcher()
        Initialize the thread pool (with a size of 10) and create a list of agents. Around 6 cashiers, 3 supervisors and 1 director

    • Method Detail

      • attend

        public void attend(Client client)
        Looking for available agents and assign clients to them until the number of clients on wait will be zero. If there aren't available agents then the client will be put on wait until an agent is vacated. Every that a future response from an agent is given, this response is shown on console.
        Parameters:
        client - The client on wait to be attend

      • lookingForAvailableAgent

        private Agent lookingForAvailableAgent()
        Check the list of agents and return the value of one agent available
        Returns:
        An available agent

      • assignClientToAgent

        private void assignClientToAgent(Agent agent,
                                 Client client)
        Assign client to agent and change availability of this agent as false
        Parameters:
        agent - Available Agent
        client - Client assigned to this agent

      • putClientOnWait

        private void putClientOnWait(Client client)
        Sleep the main thread for 10 milliseconds and try again to attend the client on wait
        Parameters:
        client - Client on wait

      • finishDispatchersJob

        public void finishDispatchersJob()
        Finish the executor service

      • createCashiers

        private void createCashiers(int numberOfCashiers)
        Add X number of cashiers to list of agents
        Parameters:
        numberOfCashiers - Number of clients which will be added to the list of agents

      • createSupervisors

        private void createSupervisors(int numberOfSupervisors)
        Add X number of supervisors to list of agents
        Parameters:
        numberOfSupervisors - Number of supervisors which will be added to the list of agents

      • createDirectors

        private void createDirectors(int numberOfDirectors)
        Add X number of directors to list of agents
        Parameters:
        numberOfDirectors - Number of directors which will be added to the list of agents
